info.description: Booking Platforması üçün Backend API sənədləri.
info.title: Booking Service API

post.description: Initiates password reset process. Sends password reset link to user email. Reset link contains unique token valid for limited time (typically 1 hour).

400.description: Validation error - invalid email format

post.description: Authenticates user using email and password. Returns JWT access and refresh tokens. On successful login, if user is owner, onboarding wizard triggered (if not completed).

400.description: Validation error

401.description: Invalid credentials

post.description: Revokes user refresh token, effectively ending session. After logout, refresh token cannot be used to obtain new access tokens. User must log in again to get new tokens.

400.description: Validation error or invalid refresh token

post.description: Generates new access token using valid refresh token. Refresh token must not be expired or revoked. Used to maintain user sessions without re-authentication.

200.description: New access token generated successfully with 15-minute expiration

400.description: Validation error

401.description: Invalid, expired, or revoked refresh token; User not found

post.description: Creates a new user account (account-first registration). Initializes a user without a business. After successful registration, user must complete onboarding wizard to create business.

201.description: User account created successfully with JWT tokens

400.description: Validation error - missing fields, invalid format, password too short

post.description: Completes password reset process using reset token and new password. Reset token generated by ForgotPassword endpoint expires after 1 hour. Token cannot be reused after first successful use.

400.description: Invalid or expired token; Password validation failure; User not found

get.description: Retrieves the authenticated user's business information. User must be a business owner. Returns full business details including location, staff, and service information.

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated

put.description: Updates the authenticated user's business information. Only business owner can update. Updates business name, phone, service category, and industry fields. Validation applied to all fields.

parameters.description: Business update data (BusinessName, Phone, ServiceCategory, Industry - all optional)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Validation error - invalid field values

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or not owner

post.description: Creates a multi-staff business for the authenticated user. Owner can invite staff members later. Staff management handled through separate endpoints.

parameters.description: Multi-staff business data (BusinessName, Phone, ServiceCategory, Industry)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Validation error - invalid or missing required fields

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated

409.description: Conflict - business already exists for user

post.description: Creates a solo practitioner business for the authenticated user. Automatically generates business, location, and active staff records. User role set to solo_practitioner.

parameters.description: Solo business data (BusinessName, Phone, ServiceCategory, Industry)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Validation error - invalid or missing required fields

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated

409.description: Conflict - business already exists for user

get.description: Retrieves business information by business ID. Can be accessed by any authenticated user (public business view). Returns business profile, location, and active staff information.

400.description: Invalid business ID format

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated

get.description: Retrieves paginated list of customers for the business. Supports pagination with page and page_size query parameters. Filters applied per business_id for multi-tenant isolation.

400.description: Invalid query parameters

401.description: Unauthorized - business_id not found

put.description: Updates customer information (partial update supported). Only accessible within the same business. Email must be unique within business if changed.

400.description: Validation error or invalid customer ID

401.description: Unauthorized - business_id not found

403.description: Access denied - customer not in this business

409.description: Email already exists in this business

post.description: Creates a new customer in the business. Only business owner and staff can create customers. Account-first: Customer can be created with or without user account.

parameters.description: Customer data (FullName, Email, Phone, Notes optional)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Validation error - missing fields, invalid format

401.description: Unauthorized - business_id not found

409.description: Email already exists in this business

delete.description: Soft deletes a customer (status changed to 'inactive'). Customer data is retained for historical records and booking history. Hard deletion is not performed to maintain referential integrity.

400.description: Invalid customer ID format

401.description: Unauthorized - business_id not found

403.description: Access denied - customer not in this business

get.description: Retrieves all locations for the authenticated business. Returns complete list of active and inactive locations with full details.

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

post.description: Creates a new location for the authenticated business. Location is address where services are provided. Each business can have multiple locations (main office, branch, etc).

parameters.description: Location data (Name, Address, City, State, Country, PostalCode, Latitude, Longitude, PhoneNumber)
parameters.name: request

201.description: Location created successfully with generated UUID

400.description: Validation error - invalid or missing required fields

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

get.description: Retrieves specific location details by location ID. Location must belong to authenticated business (multi-tenancy filtering applied).

400.description: Invalid location ID format

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

put.description: Updates location details for authenticated business. Supports partial updates - only provided fields are updated. Location must belong to business (multi-tenancy filtering applied).

parameters.description: Location update data (all fields optional - Name, Address, City, State, Country, PostalCode, Latitude, Longitude, PhoneNumber)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Validation error - invalid field values or invalid location ID format

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

delete.description: Soft-deletes a location by marking it as inactive. Location is not permanently deleted - it remains in database for historical records. Deactivated locations cannot be used for new bookings. Location must belong to authenticated business.

400.description: Validation error or invalid location ID format

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

get.description: Retrieves all services offered by the authenticated business. Returns complete list of active and inactive services with pricing, duration, and staff assignment information.

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

get.description: Retrieves specific service details by service ID. Service must belong to authenticated business. Returns service name, description, duration, price, and staff assignments.

400.description: Invalid service ID format

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

put.description: Updates service details for authenticated business. Supports partial updates - only provided fields are modified. Service must belong to business. Updates name, description, duration, pricing, and status.

parameters.description: Service update data (all fields optional - Name, Description, Duration, Price, IsActive)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Validation error - invalid field values or invalid service ID format

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

delete.description: Soft-deletes a service by marking it as inactive. Service is not permanently deleted - remains in database for historical records. Deactivated services cannot be booked. Service must belong to authenticated business.

400.description: Validation error or invalid service ID format

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

get.description: Retrieves all staff members for the authenticated business. Returns complete list of active and inactive staff with user associations, specializations, and availability status.

200.description: Staff list retrieved successfully (array of StaffWithUserHTTPResponse)

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

post.description: Creates a new staff member profile for multi-staff business. Used when directly adding staff without invitation flow (admin creates profile). Staff member becomes available for service assignment. Only available for multi-staff businesses.

parameters.description: Staff profile data (FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone, Specializations - optional)
parameters.name: request

201.description: Staff profile created successfully with generated UUID

400.description: Validation error - invalid or missing required fields

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

post.description: Sends invitation to join business as staff member (zero-knowledge invitation flow). Generates unique invitation token valid for 7 days. Invitee receives token and can accept by creating password and joining business. Used for multi-staff businesses to onboard team members.

parameters.description: Invitation details (FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone, Role - provider_owner, staff, customer)
parameters.name: request

201.description: Invitation created successfully with token and expiration

400.description: Validation error - invalid email format or staff already invited

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

post.description: Completes staff member onboarding by accepting invitation and setting password. User must be authenticated (user_id from context). Uses zero-knowledge invitation flow - staff sets their own password without server storing temporary passwords. Staff becomes active member after acceptance. Token is marked as used and cannot be reused.

parameters.description: Invitation token and password for account setup
parameters.name: request

200.description: Invitation accepted successfully, staff member activated

400.description: Invalid or expired token, password validation failure

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or user_id missing

post.description: Validates staff invitation token before acceptance. Returns invitation details if token is valid and not expired. No authentication required - used during invitation onboarding flow. Token must be valid and within 7-day expiration window.

200.description: Token is valid with invitation details (FirstName, LastName, Email, BusinessName)

400.description: Invalid, expired, or already-used invitation token

get.description: Retrieves specific staff member details by staff ID. Includes services assigned, specializations, user account info, and availability status. Staff member must belong to authenticated business.

400.description: Invalid staff ID format

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

put.description: Updates staff member details for authenticated business. Supports partial updates - only provided fields are modified. Updates name, email, phone, specializations, and availability status. Staff member must belong to business.

parameters.description: Staff update data (all fields optional - FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone, Specializations, IsActive)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Validation error - invalid field values or invalid staff ID format

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

delete.description: Soft-deletes a staff member by marking as inactive. Staff member is not permanently deleted - remains in database for historical booking records. Deactivated staff cannot book new appointments. Staff member must belong to authenticated business.

400.description: Validation error or invalid staff ID format

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

get.description: Retrieves all services assigned to a specific staff member. Returns services the staff member is qualified and available to provide. Staff member must belong to authenticated business.

200.description: Staff services retrieved successfully (array of ServiceHTTPResponse)

400.description: Invalid staff ID format

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

post.description: Assigns multiple services to a staff member. Staff member becomes available to book appointments for assigned services. All services must exist and belong to authenticated business. Staff member must belong to business.

parameters.description: Service IDs to assign (ServiceIDs array of UUID strings)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Validation error - invalid staff ID format, invalid service IDs, or staff/service not found

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing

delete.description: Removes a specific service from a staff member's service list. Staff member becomes unavailable to book appointments for this service. Service assignment removed but service and staff member remain active.

400.description: Validation error - invalid staff/service ID format or service not assigned to staff

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or business_id missing
